channel.title: pip on Jonathan`s Blog
channel.description: Recent content in pip on Jonathan`s Blog

item.title: 炼丹杂记 -- Windows 下使用 pip 安装 opendr
item.description: 问题描述 直接使用 pip install opendr 会报一个 failed with exit code 1181 的错误。 解决办法 首先安装 glfw，是 opengl 的一个框架： pip install glfw 在这里下载 opendr 后构建并安装： > git clone https://github.com/polmorenoc/opendr.git > cd ./opendr/opendr > python

item.title: 炼丹杂记 -- Python 2 安装 opencv-python 包出错解决办法
item.description: 问题描述 在为使用 Python 2.7 的虚拟环境使用如下命令安装 OpenCV 时 pip2 install opencv-python 出现了如下报错： TypeError: 'NoneType' object is not iterable 原因分析 出现这种情况是因为最新版的 OpenCV 不再支持 Python 2.7，而

item.title: BLWL[32] Pyinstaller 打包时报错 TypeError: an integer is required (got type bytes)
item.description: 报错示例 Traceback (most recent call last): File "/home/godlovesjonny/.local/bin/pyinstaller", line 8, in <module> sys.exit(run()) File "/usr/lib/python3.8/site-packages/PyInstaller/__main__.py", line 111, in run run_build(pyi_config, spec_file, **vars(args)) File "/usr/lib/python3.8/site-packages/PyInstaller/__main__.py", line 63, in run_build PyInstaller.building.build_main.main(pyi_config, spec_file, **kwargs) File "/usr/lib/python3.8/site-packages/PyInstaller/building/build_main.py", line 844, in main build(specfile, kw.get('distpath'), kw.get('workpath'), kw.get('clean_build')) File "/usr/lib/python3.8/site-packages/PyInstaller/building/build_main.py", line 791, in build exec(code, spec_namespace) File "/home/godlovesjonny/Jonny/Installs/v2rayL-master/v2rayL-GUI/v2rayLui.spec", line 18, in <module> pyz = PYZ(a.pure, a.zipped_data, File "/usr/lib/python3.8/site-packages/PyInstaller/building/api.py", line 98, in __init__ self.__postinit__() File
